name: Tap Dunk - Basketball
description:
Tap... Tap... and Dunk!

Tap Dunk is a fast paced game which will push your virtual basketball skills to the limit!

Shoot some hoops in three awesome locations! Impress your fans with some epic jams at the Arena, show your neighborhood who's boss at the Playground, and then relax with some Beachside hoops!

Earn Stars to buy awesome looking balls! You can now jam with an 8-ball, a glowing orb and more!

Can you beat your friends' high scores? Install now to find out! When it comes to fun, arcade experiences, this game is a real slam dunk!
